```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='hide'}
##An if statement for checking if a package is installed 

if (!require(tidycensus)) {
  install.packages("tidycensus")
}
if (!require(tidyverse)) {
  install.packages("tidyverse")
}
if (!require(dplyr)) {
  install.packages("dplyr")
}
if (!require(ggplot2)) {
  install.packages("ggplot2")
}

```
